title: Google pulling the plug on ‘low value’ URL parameters tool next month
content:
Google about to close a tool that’s been available since 2009. The URL parameters tool used by webmasters will officially be discontinued by Google next month, but it’s no huge loss.

more…

The post Google pulling the plug on ‘low value’ URL parameters tool next month appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Sometime in April 2022, Google will shut down its URL parameters tool that has been available for over a decade, since 2009.
